TI: [Analysis of coordinate systems of intracerebral structures and optimization of sterotaxic computations for the posterior longitudinal approach to the hippocampus].
AB: In studying the three-dimensional interrelationship of the thalamic and temporal systems of co-ordinates it was proved that one of them cannot be used in calculating the stereotaxic co-ordinates of structures associated with the other. In combined stereotaxic operations it is necessary to construct combined independent systems of co-ordinates. The possibility of exact construction of the co-ordinate systems of intracerebral structures depends to a great measure on the positive contrasting of the ventricular system.
TT: Analiz sistem koordinat vnutrimozgovykh struktur i optimizatsiia stereotaksicheskikh raschetov pri zadnem prodol'non dostupe k gippokampu.
TA: Zh Vopr Neirokhir Im N N Burdenko
JT: Zhurnal voprosy neirokhirurgii imeni N. N. Burdenko
SO: Zh Vopr Neirokhir Im N N Burdenko. 1979 Sep-Oct;(5):30-4.
